projects.description: Here are some of the projects I have worked on.

projectcard.description1: Web application that allows users to create and manage product orders with ease. Customers can browse and add products to their order. Technologies used: Next.js, typescript, tailwindcss, Prisma, MySql, and more.
projectcard.description2: Application where a registered user can create projects dashboards for manage their tasks and invite other users to collaborate. Technologies used: React, typescript, tailwindcss, MongoDB, Express, Mailtrap, zod and more.
projectcard.description3: This project lets users effortlessly search for drink recipes by name or ingredient. Users can also mark their favorite drinks for quick access on a dedicated favorites page. Built with Zod, Zustand, Headless UI, Tailwind CSS.
projectcard.description4: This application allows users to manage pets and track their symptoms. Users can add detailed information about the pet and its owner, including a recovery date. Technologies used: React, typescript, tailwindcss, Zustand.
projectcard.description5: Simple application that allows users to search for cryptocurrencies and view their prices. The project was developed using open API cryptocompare, react with typescript, tailwindcss, axios, Zod and Zustand.
projectcard.description6: A web app where users can create a list of movies they’ve watched to keep track, discover new movies, comment, and mark favorites. Created with react, axios, cloudinary, sass, redux, materialUi and more.
projectcard.description7: A web app that allows users to find dog walkers in their area, rate them, and share their experiences. Users can also register as walkers to earn extra income.
